this is something I personally came to
appreciate deeply during my childhood
my father grew up in India in a village
with no electricity he learned to read
by candlelight in a home that routinely
reached 110Â° in the summer because there
was no air conditioning or even
fans as an adult my father Rose to
become CEO of a company that worked to
bring electricity to every part of
India he always had a deep appreciation
for how the product he was selling could
change the lives of his customers and
how the jobs his company was creating
could transform the lives of his

and it gave me a palpable sense that
businesses have a unique

Victory is making quick pit
